title: Summoners' Society: Hiring

embed.description: Summoners' Society was revamped in 2014, where we slowly started to build up our teams. The social media team has only been around for 2 years. We are currently the largest community group in Oceania. We are striving to create an engaging social media experience.

body:
Hey Summoners!

Summoners' Society is one the biggest and most active League of Legends Community!  We are currently looking for people with a talent for social media and a passion for keeping our forums clean!

We will help you with:
*Learning hard & Soft skills
*Helping you reach your career goals
*Fantastic references from team leaders
*Monthly rewards for team members

If you have any question please ask on 
Discord Message: Mystery#0016 on discord 
Or
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/summonerssociety/
